# boneIndices

**Instance Property**

The geometry source defining the mapping from bone indices in skeleton data to the skinner’s bones array.

## Declaration

```swift
var boneIndices: SCNGeometrySource { get }
```

## Discussion

This geometry source’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNGeometrySource/semantic-swift.property] property must be [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNGeometrySource/Semantic-swift.struct/boneIndices]. Its data is an array of integer vectors, each of which corresponds to a weight vector in the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSkinner/boneWeights] geometry source. Each component in a vector specifies the index of the node in the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSkinner/bones] array for the corresponding bone weight component.

## Working with an Animation Skeleton

- **skeleton**: The root node of the skinner object’s animation skeleton.
- **bones**: The control nodes of the animation skeleton.
- **boneInverseBindTransforms**: The default transforms for the animation skeleton’s bone nodes.
- **boneWeights**: The geometry source that defines the influence of each bone on the positions the geometry’s vertices.
